page.title: 10Ballingry: Recreation
page.content:
Adult Recreation: Craigie Bar- drinking,sing-song,pool, darts,football team Lochore Institute- drinking,dancing, snooker,darts,bingo,bandit,bowls Crosshill Club- dancing,drinking,darts Auld Shank- drinking,pool,bandit,darts Social Club- keep fit Bookies- gambling Thornton Race Track- greyhound racing Lochore Meadows- separate entry Community Centre- separate entry Ferreting- in surrounding hills. There are no restaurants locally.
Children's recreation: Indoors- Monopoly,Ludo,darts,snooker, TV,video games,etc. Outdoors- football,hide and seek,kick the can,skipping games,chases etc. Clubs- Youth club,Guides,Cadets etc. Wendy Cairns (10) and classmates
